QuestData.Title: Tears for Fears
QuestData.Description: The Tears of Elune are a sacred artifact, protected by my order for thousands of years. I tell you this so that you may understand the gravity of your request.$b$bThat said, Ysera is noble and wise and I trust in her guidance. You will find the tears in a vault at the eastern edge of the temple grounds.$b$bProceed with caution though, as that area has been overrun by demons.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the Tears of Elune?
QuestData.RewardText: Xavius has stolen our sacred artifact?$b$bElune, forgive me. I have failed you.
